text: Avu (a jinnâ€Œgalu) avaru (sulaimanaru) bayasidante avarigagi, brhat kattadagalannu pratimegalannu, kolagalantaha harivanagalannu sthiravagiruva brhat pakapatregalannu nirmisi koduttiddavu. Davudara santatigale, nivu krtajnaragi, satkarmagalannu madiri. Nanna dasaralli kelavaru matra krtajnaru
